DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether (a) a brief alcohol intervention, (b) a brief bystander and social norms intervention, or (c) a brief alcohol and a brief bystander and social norms intervention are effective at reducing alcohol use and sexual-related behaviors among college men mandated to receive an alcohol intervention by their university.
DOC.brief_title: Interventions for Sanctioned Ohio University Students
DOC.criteria: Must be 18 or older; must be an ohio university student; must be male; must be sanctioned to receive an alcohol intervention by Ohio University Under the age of 18; not attending the main Ohio University campus (Athens)
